headerDisplay: This plugin supports the Dyson Pure Cool (DP04, TP04, TP06, TP07), Dyson Pure Cool Link (DP01, TP02), Dyson Hot+Cool (HP02, HP04, HP06, HP09) and Dyson Pure Humidify+Cool (PH01, PH02, PH04) devices.

ipAddress.title: IP Address
ipAddress.description: Local IP address of the device.

credentials.title: Credentials
credentials.description: The credentials for connecting to the device. They can be retrieved via the credentials generator (website), please consult the README on how to retrieve the credentials.

enableAutoModeWhenActivating.title: Enable Auto Mode
enableAutoModeWhenActivating.description: If set to true, the Auto mode is enabled when you activate the device in the Home app.

enableOscillationWhenActivating.title: Enable Auto Oscillation
enableOscillationWhenActivating.description: If set to true, oscillation is enabled when you active the device.

isNightModeEnabled.title: Enable Night Mode
isNightModeEnabled.description: If set to true, a switch is exposed for the night mode.

isJetFocusEnabled.title: Enable Jet Focus
isJetFocusEnabled.description: If set to true, a switch is exposed for the jet focus. DP01, TP02 and HP02 are not supported.

isContinuousMonitoringEnabled.title: Enable Continuous Monitoring
isContinuousMonitoringEnabled.description: If set to true, a switch is exposed for the continuous monitoring.

isTemperatureSensorEnabled.title: Enable Temperature Sensor
isTemperatureSensorEnabled.description: If set to true, a separate temperature sensor is exposed. Only used for non-heating devices. If set to false, the temperature is added as characteristic to the air purifier (does not show up in the Apple Home app).

isHumiditySensorEnabled.title: Enable Humidity Sensor
isHumiditySensorEnabled.description: If set to true, a separate humidity sensor is exposed. Only used for non-humidifier devices. If set to false, the humidity is added as characteristic to the air purifier (supported in the Apple Home app).

isAirQualitySensorEnabled.title: Enable Air Quality Sensor
isAirQualitySensorEnabled.description: If set to true, a separate air quality sensor is exposed. If set to false, the air quality is added as characteristic to the air purifier (supported in the Apple Home app).

isSingleSensorAccessoryModeEnabled.title: Single Sensor Accessory Mode
isSingleSensorAccessoryModeEnabled.description: If set to true, all sensors are exposed to HomeKit in a single accessory instead of multiple accessories. Only has an effect if the previous settings for enabling sensors are set to true.

isSingleAccessoryModeEnabled.title: Single Accessory Mode
isSingleAccessoryModeEnabled.description: If set to true, all services are exposed to HomeKit in a single accessory instead of multiple accessories. If set to true, the single sensor accessory mode has no effect. Use this mode if you are using a third-party HomeKit app and want all services grouped into a single accessory.

isFullRangeHumidity.title: Full Range Humidity
isFullRangeHumidity.description: Only for PH01/PH02/PH04. If set to true, the range of the target humidity control will be from 0% to 100% instead of translating it to the allowed range (30% to 70%) of the Dyson.

isHeatingDisabled.title: Disable Heating
isHeatingDisabled.description: Only for HP02/HP04/HP06/HP09. If set to true, the heating controls are not exposed to HomeKit.

updateInterval.title: Update Interval
updateInterval.description: The interval (in milliseconds) at which updates of the sensors are requested from the Dyson devices.

credentialsGeneratorPort.title: Port number for Credentials Generator
credentialsGeneratorPort.description: The port number for the (credentials generator) website. Only change this setting in case of a port collision.
